programmes.show_description: Kicking off the first week of his Takeover, Gunni steps up with a heavyweight blend of South Asian bangers, UK heat and everything in between! Expect the unexpected! Contains strong language.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network's Club Hit Squad Mix
programmes.show_description: Panjabi Hit Squad are stepping into the Club Hit Squad experience with a big 30-minute Asian hip-hop mix, bringing pure club vibes straight to your speakers.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network's Club Hit Squad Mix
programmes.show_description: Love is in the air... and so is the bass. Dee and Rav are setting the mood this Valentine's, delivering a soundtrack smoother than Usher.
Gagan Grewal celebrates the icon that is Karisma Kapoor, playing some of her best interview clips and talking you through her incredible filmography.
Get ready to feel every beat with Gagan's Bollywood tabla tunes! He's bringing you a handpicked collection of Bollywood hits featuring the mesmerising rhythms of the tabla.

Nonstop Asian Network bangers!
Ease into Sunday with AJD with a warm selection of music from Bhangra, Bollywood, Bangladeshi beats and Tamil tracks. Perfect for a relaxed start.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Certified Throwbacks with AJD
programmes.show_description: AJD takes you back with Asian Network Certified Throwbacks, celebrating tracks that defined moments in the past and still hit hard today.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Bollywood with Gagan Grewal
programmes.show_description: March into nostalgia with Gagan Grewal as he brings you the best in throwback Bollywood! Expect to hear tunes from Shraddha Kapoor movies and vocals by Shankar Mahadevan and more!

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Punjabi with Dipps Bhamrah
programmes.show_description: Dipps hits play on fresh selections from Sukhshinder Shinda, G Khan, Mickey Singh and En Karma, keeping your playlist current and familiar with the sounds you love.
...Entertainment Show with DJ Kye. Discover new Bengali beats from Jai Wolf & Habib Wahid and kick back with Senti Sunday! The ideal soundtrack for a Sunday afternoon with DJ Kye sitting in.
...Entertainment Show with Kan D Man. Pakistani music, entertainment and news with Kan D Man.
...and Tamil Entertainment Show with Pritt. Love South Indian and Tamil music? Then you need to tune into Pritt as she brings you all the best beats from this part of the globe and the diaspora.
Bobby Friction tips BBB, Yung Sammy and Wamp for big things in Future Friction, Schooling the Nation breaks down Dard-E-Disco plus a Live Jam from Tazzz and Priti Menon. Contains strong language.
Shankeya and Saima try figure out if they would survive each other's household! Contains some strong language and adult humour.

programmes.show_name: The Ultimate Eid Playlist with DJ Manara
